title: Fests and Gym
content: What is the scenario of gyms in PES and what are the charges for both the campus (RR and EC).also how is the fest and are students from one campus allowed to attend fest of other campus?

comments.body:
Gyms - As far as I heard costs around 10k per semester. It's open to everyone. 

Fests - already answered in FAQ
Can you give the link where you mentioned about fests.

gym: rumor has it, its going to be increased to 15k a year, otw 10k
fests: not worth the cost, but u can attend both campuses
Has a so called gym but it sucks badly
Only has a single treadmill, some dumbbells and a barbell ðŸ¤¡
Okay.....I have more things at home compared to that
It's an answer given by u/rowlet-owl
Gym is 10k/annum and fests usually suck.

The gym in RR campus used to cost 10k for an academic year (no matter when you valid membership is only valid till the end of academic year). The equipments are one of the best you can find but the batch timings are a big pain.
Recently I saw the new gym pics in EC campus and I got to say it's pretty good .
The new gym is in MRD Student centre right?
Wdym "not worth the cost" how much should we pay for fests?
depends on event to event, 500-600 for the major ones and 100-200 for the smaller club events
